name: LitMan Level Seventy Eight
description:
[quote]Latest Update. Dev Kit Version 300976.29848.[/quote]

[b]Up to Level 78.[/b]

Original Stats:
60 Levels
7 619 025 XP
402 Attribute Points
497 Feats

Modded Stats:
78 Levels
41 793 982 XP
648 Attribute Points
788 Feats

Does not work with "LitMan Level One Fifty Six".

It is safe to replace this Mod with "LitMan Level One Fifty Six". 

[quote]IMPORTANT: This Mod increases Level needed to open Legendary Chests to 78. If you want to be able open Legendary Chests from Level 1 you could use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1367028501]LitMan Loot Legendary Chests[/url].[/quote]

Support Channel on Discord: https://discord.gg/yqvQm6B

I released all my Source files on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods if anyone wants to keep updated those Mods or release own ones.

If you need a previous version it also could be found on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods/tree/master/Compiled
